description: This file is a configuration file for Vite, a build tool commonly used for Vue.js projects. It sets up plugins, resolve aliases, and server options for the development environment.

methods.name: defineConfig
methods.description: Defines and exports the Vite configuration object with plugin and server settings.

methods.name: vueJsx
methods.description: Vite plugin for Vue JSX support

methods.name: vueDevTools
methods.description: Vite plugin for Vue.js development tools integration
